channel.title: A simple idea for a simple program
channel.description: I came up with an idea for an rs program that would rock: A program that shows the currently loaded minimap area. Thats it. Is it possible?

item.title: A simple idea for a simple program
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

if you want it the same size as the mini map u would just have it call the interface but if your taking changing it then im not sure about that

Read full topic

no it wouldn’t, it’d be nearly impossible in vb, it would need to get the loaded area from the client

item.title: A simple idea for a simple program
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Actually, it wouldn’t be all that hard, nor would it be all that practical.

The minimap takes up a good bit of memory in the game, the map takes up quite a bit too, combining the two is a nasty thought

Read full topic
